text:
@ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump I have been saying since he became the 45th occupant of the White House, #TraitorTrump
Now the rest of US discovers his treasonous acts and behavior. This grotesque character will not only kill us through health care & COVID-19 & racism, but he will also kill our own troops.
